Description: Lower body sherd of Chian pottery Simple Animal Style patterned chalice with part of handle zone; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown with two added white bands; exterior: reserved above handle zone; two lines above part of set of vertical strokes flanking the handle.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0906) (phase 2)
